author: IANS
title: Priyanka Chopra to attend 2017 Oscars

organizations.name: academy of motion picture arts and sciences

text:
A post shared by Priyanka Chopra (@priyankachopra) on Feb 24, 2017 at 6:24pm PST 
Apart from Priyanka, actress Priyanka Bose is also expected to attend the 2017 Oscars for her film Lion . This won’t be the first time when Priyanka would be gracing the red carpet at Oscars. 
The 34-year-old, who got fame in the West through her lead role of Alex Parrish in TV thriller series Quantico , was one of the presenters at the 88th Academy Awards last year. A post shared by Priyanka Chopra (@priyankachopra) on Feb 28, 2016 at 3:15pm PST 
Looking stunning in an elegant white gown, a creation by Lebanese designer Zuhair Murad, Priyanka presented the Oscar in the Best Film Editing category to Mad Max: Fury Road along with Hollywood star Liev Schreiber. 
Hosted by Jimmy Kimmel, the 2017 Oscars, presented by the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences (AMPAS), will honour the best films of 2016. 
When Priyanka Chopra was body-shamed by a film producer 
Besides Oscars, the former Miss World has also presented trophies at the 68th Emmy Awards, 2016 SAG awards and the 74th annual Golden Globe Awards among others. 
Priyanka has also won two People’s Choice Awards – one each for Favourite Actress in a New TV series and Favourite Dramatic TV Actress categories – for her role in Quantico . 
Priyanka is also set to make her Hollywood debut alongside Dwayne “The Rock” Johnson and Zac Efron with upcoming film Baywatch .
